pageTitle: Atone for the role of businesses in mass atrocities
description: How can companies atone for slavery ties? Lloydâ€™s of London researched its historical ties to slavery and made those findings available and offered an unequivocal apology. the role of businesses in mass atrocities.  Other U.S. financial companies benefited from the slave trade by selling life-insurance policies on the lives of enslaved people.

topicText:
How can companies atone for slavery ties? Financial giant sets an ...
'The moral tenor of our times has changed. Where do you want to be in it?' says Sarah Federman, an expert on the role of businesses in mass atrocities.
